actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to prohibit the withdrawal of merchandise from a customs bonded warehouse for exportation pursuant to retail sales unless such warehouse is located in close proximity to a port, airport, or border-crossing station.

summary.text: Prohibts the withdrawal of merchandise, without the payment of import duties, pursuant to the Tariff Act of 1930, from a customs bonded warehouse for exportation pursuant to retail sales unless such warehouse is located in close proximity to a port, airport, or border crossing station.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the withdrawal of merchandise from a customs bonded warehouse for exportation pursuant to retail sales unless such warehouse is located in close proximity to a port, airport, or border-crossing station.
